pages.mashup_demo.json: {"layout":"application","areas":{"content1a":[{"widget":"amd:laxar-developer-tools-widget","features":{"button":{"enabled":false},"open":{"onActions":["showDevTools"],"onGlobalMethod":"goDevelop"}}},{"widget":"mashup-demo/data-provider-widget","id":"dataProvider","features":{"title":{"htmlLabel":" Select a Data Example"},"data":{"resource":"timeSeriesData","items":[{"title":"Stock Price Example 1","description":"Three series on a grid spanning 5 years.","location":"application/data/stock_price_example_1.json"},{"title":"Stock Price Example 2","description":"Three series on a grid spanning 14 years.","location":"application/data/stock_price_example_2.json"},{"title":"Stock Price Example 3","description":"Seven series on a grid spanning 14 years.","location":"application/data/stock_price_example_3.json"}]},"messages":{"i18nFailedLoadingResource":"Could not load resource \"[resource]\""}}},{"widget":"mashup-demo/table-editor-widget","id":"tableEditor","features":{"title":{"htmlLabel":" Edit the Data Source"},"timeSeries":{"resource":"timeSeriesData"}}}],"content1b":[{"widget":"mashup-demo/chart-widget","id":"pieChart","features":{"title":{"htmlLabel":" Pie Chart"},"timeSeries":{"resource":"timeSeriesData"},"chart":{"type":"pieChart"}}},{"widget":"mashup-demo/chart-widget","id":"stackedAreaChart","features":{"title":{"htmlLabel":" Line Chart"},"timeSeries":{"resource":"timeSeriesData"},"chart":{"type":"stackedAreaChart"}}},{"widget":"mashup-demo/chart-widget","id":"multiBarChart","features":{"title":{"htmlLabel":" Multi Bar Chart"},"timeSeries":{"resource":"timeSeriesData"},"chart":{"type":"multiBarChart"}}}]}}

default.theme.ax-developer-tools-widget.html: <button type="button" class="btn btn-warning" data-ng-if="enabled && features.button.enabled" data-ng-bind-html="features.button.htmlLabel" data-ng-click="commands.open()"></button>

laxar-developer-tools-widget.widget.json: {"name":"ax-developer-tools-widget","description":"Provides developer tools to inspect the event bus and the application log, and the grid-alignment of widgets","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"open":{"type":"object","properties":{"onActions":{"type":"array","default":[],"items":{"type":"string","format":"topic"}},"onGlobalMethod":{"type":"string","description":"method on the global object (window) which may be called to show the developer tools, for example from a bookmark","default":"laxarShowDeveloperTools"}}},"button":{"type":"object","description":"allows to render a button that opens the popup","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","default":true},"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","default":" DeveloperTools"}}},"grid":{"type":"object","properties":{"anchor":{"type":"string","default":"[data-ax-page], [ax-page]"},"columns":{"type":"object","properties":{"count":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of grid columns to draw","default":12},"width":{"type":"integer","description":"The width of each CSS grid column (in pixels, including padding, without gutter)","default":78},"padding":{"type":"integer","description":"The left and right padding for each grid column (in pixels)","default":13},"gutter":{"type":"integer","description":"The horizontal space between two grid columns (in pixels).","default":13}},"default":{"width":78,"gutter":26,"padding":13,"count":12}},"css":{"type":"object","default":{"margin":"0 auto","box-sizing":"content-box","position":"fixed","top":0,"right":0,"bottom":0,"left":0,"z-index":100}}}},"develop":{"type":"object","description":"allows to use the development version (debug.html) of the developer tools","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","default":false}}}}}}

chart-widget.widget.json: {"name":"chart-widget","description":"Widget to display a chart from time series data","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["timeSeries"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Title for the chart."}}},"timeSeries":{"type":"object","description":"Provide the data to display in another widget.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","format":"topic","axRole":"intlet","description":"Name of the data resource"}}},"chart":{"type":"object","description":"Set options for the chart representation.","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","enum":["pieChart","stackedAreaChart","multiBarChart"],"default":"pieChart","description":"Type of the chart, excepted types are defined in external library NVD3."}}}}}}

default.theme.data-provider-widget.html: {{$index + 1}}. {{item.description}}

data-provider-widget.widget.json: {"name":"data-provider-widget","description":"Widget that provides other widgets with data.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["data"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"List selection title"}}},"data":{"type":"object","required":["resource","items"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","format":"topic","axRole":"outlet","description":"ID of resource to publish."},"items":{"type":"array","description":"An array of data sets of which a user can choose one to be published.","minItems":1,"items":{"type":"object","required":["title","location"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","description":"Title of the data set."},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Short description of the data set that is displayed below the title."},"location":{"type":"string","description":"URL to load the resource from when the submit button is pressed."}}}}}},"messages":{"type":"object","description":"Configuration of messages published via didEncounterError or didValidate events.","properties":{"i18nFailedLoadingResource":{"type":["object","string"],"description":"didEncounterError message to publish when a GET for a resource fails. [resource] is replaced by the actual name of the resource.","default":"Could not load resource \"[resource]\""}}}}}}

table-editor-widget.widget.json: {"name":"table-editor-widget","description":"A widget that provides a spreadsheet-like content editor.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"controls":["laxar-date-picker-control"],"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["timeSeries"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Editable table title"}}},"timeSeries":{"type":"object","description":"Shows the time series in an editable table.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource which should refer to a 2-dimensional array.","format":"topic","axRole":"inlet"}}}}}}
